name: UP915559: Ultimate Block Breaker!
description:
Ultimate Block Breaker is a block breaking game, Block breaking games are very well known worldwide with it's first release back in 1976, so it is one of the pioneers in the gaming Industry.

I remmember playing a game of this type a long time ago in my mobilephone, and I've always enjoyed the concept of it.

This is my version of it, I think I made it a little bit challenging, but at the same time it is really fun to play.

I hope you guys enjoy playing it, and im looking forward for your reviews.

That is all from me.

Peace. kosmic Out.
